name: Will Wood
subtitle: The Normal Tour
description: Will Wood is back in concert! Featuring tracks from his album: The Normal Album, expect hijinx and chicanery! Don't miss the chance to experience his unique style and stage presence live.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Basic viewing ticket experience at Cooltown Arena.

tickets.name: VIP Admission
tickets.description: Up and close viewing with a chance to meet Will backstage!

name: Green Thumb Expo
subtitle: Annual Gardening Trade Show
description: Join gardening enthusiasts and experts from around the world for workshops, exhibitions, and networking opportunities. Discover the latest in gardening trends and techniques while connecting with like-minded individuals.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Access to all exhibition halls and general workshops.

tickets.name: VIP Admission
tickets.description: Includes general access, premium workshops, and an exclusive gift bag.

name: Cooltown Regional Championship
subtitle: High School Basketball Semifinals
description: The top four high school teams face off in an exciting semifinal showdown. Come support your local athletes and enjoy an action-packed day of basketball.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Seating on a first-come, first-served basis.

tickets.name: Courtside Seating
tickets.description: Get up close to the action with courtside seats.

name: Comedy Night
subtitle: A Night of Funny
description: A lineup of hilarious stand-up comedians from around the country for one unforgettable night. Prepare for an evening filled with laughter and good vibes.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Seating on a first-come, first-served basis.

tickets.name: VIP Table
tickets.description: Reserved table seating with complimentary snacks and drinks.

name: Battle of the Bands
subtitle: Music!
description: Watch the best local bands compete for the title of Cooltown's favorite! Featuring special guest judges and audience voting, this event promises to be a thrilling musical showdown.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Access to all performances. Standing room only.

tickets.name: Preferred Seating
tickets.description: Reserved seats near the stage for an enhanced experience.

name: Wine and Cheese Tasting
subtitle: A food festival for all!
description: Join us for an evening of wine and cheese tasting. Experience an exquisite selection of wines paired with a variety of gourmet cheeses.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Access to all tastings.

tickets.name: VIP Admission
tickets.description: Includes general access, a private tasting, and a take-home gift.

name: Charity Run
subtitle: Supporting Red Cross
description: Join us for a charity run to support the local community. Enjoy the fresh air and exercise while contributing to a great cause.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Participate in the charity run.

tickets.name: VIP Admission
tickets.description: Includes general access, a free t-shirt, and access to the VIP area.

name: Karaoke Night
subtitle: Bring friends! Drinks being sold!
description: Join us for a night of karaoke fun. Sing your heart out and enjoy a wide selection of songs.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Access to the karaoke event.

tickets.name: VIP Admission
tickets.description: Includes general access, a free drink, and priority entry.

name: Paint and Sip
subtitle: Paint and get tipsy, you get it.
description: Join us for a night of painting and sipping. Unleash your creativity while enjoying a glass of your favorite beverage.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Access to the paint and sip event.

tickets.name: VIP Admission
tickets.description: Includes general access, a free drink, and a take-home canvas.

name: Trivia Night
subtitle: Test yourself and your friends!
description: Join us for a night of trivia fun. Challenge your knowledge and compete with others in a lively atmosphere.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Access to the trivia event.

tickets.name: VIP Admission
tickets.description: Includes general access, a free drink, and priority entry.

name: Comedy Open Mic
subtitle: Listen to the funniest people from YOUR area!
description: Join us for a night of comedy open mic. Witness local talents as they deliver their best jokes on stage.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Access to the comedy open mic event.

tickets.name: VIP Admission
tickets.description: Includes general access, a free drink, and priority entry.

name: Book Con
subtitle: Including over 20 authors!
description: Join us for a night of book discussion. Meet and interact with authors, participate in panels, and explore the world of literature.

tickets.name: General Admission
tickets.description: Access to the book con event.

tickets.name: VIP Admission

name: Art Show
subtitle: See the most thought provoking pieces from students and artists.
description: Join us for an evening of art viewing and discussion. Discover inspiring works from emerging and established artists.

tickets.description: Access to the art show event.

name: Music Night
subtitle: Featuring 15 bands!
description: Join us for a night of music performances. Experience a diverse lineup of bands and enjoy a variety of musical genres.
